Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent local Fly = Tool.Handle local Lid = Fly:WaitForChild('Lid')
local Character local Player local Torso local Humanoid
local Debris = Game:GetService('Debris') local InsertService = Game:GetService('InsertService')
local ButterflyId = 117470774
local Equipped = false
local Butterfly = InsertService:LoadAsset(ButterflyId):GetChildren()[1]
Tool.Enabled = true local RawDamage = 9
local Gravity = 196.2 local Velocity = 50.0
local LidWeld = Tool:WaitForChild('LidWeld')
function ComputeLaunchAngle(dx, dy, grav) local g = math.abs(grav) local inRoot = (Velocity * Velocity * Velocity * Velocity) - (g * ((g * dx * dx) + (2 * dy * Velocity * Velocity))) if inRoot <= 0 then return 0.25 * math.pi end local root = math.sqrt(inRoot) local inATan1 = ((Velocity * Velocity) + root) / (g*dx)
local inATan2 = ((Velocity * Velocity) - root) / (g*dx) local a1 = math.atan(inATan1) local a2 = math.atan(inATan2) if a1 < a2 then return a1 end return a2 end
local function Poison(hPart, part) if hPart and hPart.Parent and part and part.Parent then local humanoid = hPart.Parent:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if humanoid and humanoid ~= Humanoid then humanoid:TakeDamage(RawDamage) if humanoid.Parent:FindFirstChild('ButterflyPoisonScript') == nil then local bScript = Tool:WaitForChild('ButterflyPoisonScript'):Clone() bScript.Parent = humanoid.Parent bScript.Disabled = false end end end end
local function DropPoison(body) if not body then return end local pPart = Instance.new('Part') pPart.FormFactor = 3 pPart.Size = Vector3.new(0.5, 0.5, 0.5) pPart.Parent = Game.Workspace pPart.CFrame = body.CFrame pPart.BrickColor = BrickColor.new('Bright green')
local fire = Instance.new('Fire') fire.Color = Color3.new(0, 1, 0) fire.Parent = pPart
pPart.Touched:connect(function(hPart) Poison(hPart, pPart) end)
Debris:AddItem(pPart, 3.0)
return pPart:Clone(), pPart end
local function LobPoison(torso, body)
local missile, missile2 = DropPoison(body) missile2:Destroy()
local target = torso.Position
local spawnPos = (body.Position - Vector3.new(0, 3, 0))
local toTarget = target - spawnPos local dY = toTarget.Y toTarget = Vector3.new(toTarget.X, 0, toTarget.Z) local dXZ = toTarget.magnitude toTarget = toTarget.unit
local theta = ComputeLaunchAngle(dXZ, dY, Gravity)
local angleY = math.sin(theta) local angleXZ = math.cos(theta)
local vY = angleY * Velocity local vX = toTarget.X * angleXZ * Velocity local vZ = toTarget.Z * angleXZ * Velocity
missile.CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos) missile.Velocity = Vector3.new(vX, vY, vZ)
missile.Parent = Game.Workspace missile.CanCollide = true missile.Touched:connect(function(hPart) Poison(hPart, missile) end)
Debris:AddItem(missile, 5) end
local function CharacterNearby(body) local region = Region3.new(body.Position + Vector3.new(-15, -15, -15), body.Position + Vector3.new(15, 15, 15)) local parts = Game.Workspace:FindPartsInRegion3(region, Character, 100) local torso
for _, part in pairs(parts) do if part and part.Parent and part.Parent:FindFirstChild('Torso') then torso = part.Parent.Torso end end
return torso end
local function FlyButterFly() if Butterfly then local body = Butterfly:WaitForChild('Body') local rWing = Butterfly:WaitForChild('RightWing') local lWing = Butterfly:WaitForChild('LeftWing') local rWeld = body:WaitForChild('RightWingWeld') local lWeld = body:WaitForChild('LeftWingWeld')
local count = 0 local anglePerFrame = 0.01 local rCFrame = rWeld.C1 local lCFrame = lWeld.C1 local targetPos
while Equipped do lWeld.C1 = lWeld.C1 * CFrame.Angles(0, anglePerFrame * (count%6), 0) rWeld.C1 = rWeld.C1 * CFrame.Angles(0, -anglePerFrame * (count%6), 0) if count%6 == 0 then anglePerFrame = -anglePerFrame end count = count + 1 targetPos = Torso.Position + Vector3.new(4, 4, 4) local distance = (Torso.Position - body.Position).magnitude if distance > 8 then body.Velocity = (targetPos - body.Position).unit * 15.0 body.CFrame = CFrame.new(body.Position, Torso.Position + Vector3.new(0, 9, 0)) end if math.random() < 0.03 then DropPoison(body) if math.random() < 0.25 then local foundTorso = CharacterNearby(body) if foundTorso then LobPoison(foundTorso, body) end end end wait() end
rWeld.C1 = rCFrame lWeld.C1 = lCFrame end end
local function OnActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
if not Torso or not Humanoid then return end
if Butterfly and Butterfly.Parent then return end
Tool.Enabled = false local fClone = Fly:Clone() Fly.Transparency = 1.0 Lid.Transparency = 1.0 fClone.CanCollide = true fClone.Parent = Game.Workspace
wait(1.5) fClone:Destroy()
if not Butterfly.Parent then Butterfly.Parent = Character Butterfly:MoveTo(Torso.Position + Vector3.new(2, 2, 2)) Spawn(function() FlyButterFly() end) end end
local function OnEquipped() Character = Tool.Parent Player = Game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character)
Torso = Character:WaitForChild('Torso') Humanoid = Character:WaitForChild('Humanoid') Equipped = true if LidWeld then LidWeld.Parent = Tool end end
local function OnUnequipped() Equipped = false Fly.Transparency = 0.5 Lid.Transparency = 0.0 Tool.Enabled = true Butterfly.Parent = nil end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequipped) Tool.Activated:connect(OnActivated)

Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Character = script.Parent local Humanoid = Character:WaitForChild('Humanoid')
local Fire = Instance.new('Fire') Fire.Color = Color3.new(0, 1, 0) Fire.Parent = Character:WaitForChild('Torso')
Game:GetService('Debris'):AddItem(Fire, 5.5)
local Duration = 4.5
while Duration > 0 do Humanoid:TakeDamage(5) Duration = Duration - wait(0.75) wait(0.75) end
wait(1.0) script:Destroy()
